topic.title: Drawing Application 2: This time it's serious
topic.text:
1. Three toggle buttons reflect state

2. Must draw a line

3. Toggle 1: change strokeWeight

4. Toggle 2: change stroke Color

5. Toggle 3: change background Color

6. only draw when pressing mouse

 

REFERENCE

http://coursescript.com/notes/interactivecomputing/interactivity/ 

 

steps:

  • make one toggle button
  • make the other two toggles
  • make mouse draw line, and off when not pressing, hint: use the mousePressed variable
  • make variables for drawing
  • connect button states to drawing variables
    • if(buttonState){
      size++; // make circle bigger if on
      }else if(buttonState == false){
      size--; // make circle smaller if off
      }
